org.jbei.ice.lib.group

Class Groups

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbei.ice.lib.group.Groups

  • public class Groups
extends Object
    Groups of users with methods for manipulation (and access)
    Author:
    Hector Plahar

      • Groups

        public Groups(String userId)

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Results<UserGroup> get(long userId)
        Retrieves groups that user is either a member of. Users are implicit members of the groups that they create so call also returns those groups
        Parameters:
        userId - id of account whose groups are being requested
        Returns:
        list of groups that user is a member of

      • get

        public Results<UserGroup> get(GroupType groupType,
                              int offset,
                              int limit)

      • getMatchingGroups

        public List<UserGroup> getMatchingGroups(String token,
                                         int limit)

      • addGroup

        public UserGroup addGroup(UserGroup userGroup)
        Adds group to the list of groups for current user
        Parameters:
        userGroup - information about group to be added, including members (local and remote)
        Returns:
        added group

      • getGroupMembers

        public UserGroup getGroupMembers(long groupId)
        Retrieves both local and remote members of the specified group if the user making the request has the appropriate permissions
        Parameters:
        groupId - unique local identifier of group
        Returns:
        information about specified group including remote and local members
        Throws:
        PermissionException - if the user does not have read permissions

      • update

        public boolean update(long groupId,
                      UserGroup userGroup)

      • setGroupMembers

        protected void setGroupMembers(Group group,
                               List<AccountTransfer> members,
                               List<RemoteUser> remoteUsers)
